meanings.definition: A person who is obsessed or preoccupied with someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The obsessor constantly talks about their favorite band.
meanings.sent2: She became an obsessor of detective novels, reading one after another.
meanings.sent3: The obsessor's love for ice cream knows no bounds.
meanings.sent4: His role model was an obsessor of fitness, always striving for perfection.
meanings.sent5: The obsessor's passion for painting consumed all their free time.

meanings.definition: A person who continually thinks about or pursues something to an excessive or troubling degree.
meanings.sent1: The obsessor couldn't stop thinking about their upcoming exam.
meanings.sent2: She was an obsessor of cleanliness, always cleaning and organizing.
meanings.sent3: The obsessor's dedication to their hobby was admirable.
meanings.sent4: His friend was an obsessor of fashion, always following the latest trends.
meanings.sent5: The obsessor's determination to succeed was unmatched.
